trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The flustered sentinel looks at you expectantly.
TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the fur blanket and purified water to the flustered sentinel.
TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_KINDVIIS03468_000_000<tab>Normally I would not think to make a request of the allies of Ronka, but this is an emergency.
TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_KINDVIIS03468_000_001<tab>One of our sisters is in labor. Would you help us make ready for the delivery?
TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_KINDVIIS03468_000_002<tab>I have asked Olmet to prepare a blanket for the child, and Ciuille fresh water.
TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_KINDVIIS03468_000_010<tab>Time is of the essence. Go and speak with Olmet and Ciuille. They will have what we need.
TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_OLMET_000_020<tab>Ah, I was told someone would be coming. Here─a blanket of our finest fur. Go on, now. They will be waiting.
TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_CIUILLE_000_021<tab>It is time, then? I finished purifying the water but moments ago. The child's ears must be cleansed before first hearkening to the call of the woods.
TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_OLMET_000_030<tab>I will not keep you. The others are waiting for that blanket.
TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_CIUILLE_000_035<tab>Be careful not to spill the water.
TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_KINDVIIS03468_000_040<tab>Do you have the blanket and water?
TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_KINDVIIS03468_000_041<tab>Good, good. With this, everything is in order.
TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_KINDVIIS03468_000_042<tab>It has been far too long since any of our sisters has given birth.
TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_KINDVIIS03468_000_043<tab>You honor us with your assistance. Would that we could allow you to meet the child once born.

TEXT_LUCKZF009_03468_KINDVIIS03468_000_044<tab>To ensure their safety, it is strictly forbidden for any save the wet nurse and immediate family to see them. Even should the opportunity never arise, make no mistake: the child will hear of your deeds. You have my word on that.
